welcome_message_body: "Welcome to St. Thomas, Canada! Known for its rich history and charming small-town vibe, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at London International Airport handles all freight and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
